title: Aagayam Thaayaga Song Lyrics Yaadhumaagi Nindraai
stanzas: <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">Aagayam Thaayaga Song Lyrics Yaadhumaagi Nindraai

Aagayam Thaaiyaaga
nee naanum seiyaaga
nam kadhal aarariro

tholodu thol saayum
nerathil nam kadhal
iravum pagalum urangiduma

manakulathinil thannaale
mazhai pozhiyudhu unnaale
iru idhazhinil thalai thuvattida vaa

iruvarum padhil sollaamal
idaiveligale illaamal
irundhida edhu
vazhi marindhidumo

Aagayam Thaaiyaaga
nee naanum seiyaaga
nam kadhal aarariro

poovodu thenaai
neerodu meenaai
ondraaga nam vazhalaam
